data.text:
AKA Sakasa Tsurushi Shibari Nawa

The story of how an average ‘salaryman’ became an SM superhero!

This is the prequel and origin story behind the cult film, S&M Hunter, and tells how a white collar worker became the world’s first sadomasochistic superhero! Now for the first time, we learn how the Roper lost his eye and gained a whip. The only superhero in a crowded universe who can truss his enemies up like a turkey and make them orgasm at the same time. S&M Hunter Begins is celluloid at its most biblical. A sleaze masterpiece!
